search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Stannp (stannp.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: Here is the URL to Stannp's official pricing page: [https://www.stannp.com/pricing](https://www.stannp.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

===============

    *   ![Image 9: Letters Icon](https://www.stannp.com/website-2022/assets/images/header_letters.svg)
        
        [Letters](https://www.stannp.com/us/letters)Full color 8.5x11 letters on 70# with windowed envelopes
        
    *   ![Image 10: Greetings Card](https://www.stannp.com/website-2022/assets/images/header_selfmailers.svg)
